title: Where Will Microsoft Stock Be in 1 Year?
text: Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian evaluates Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) stock and its prospects for 2024 to provide a stock price prediction. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of Jan. 10, 2024.
